extendedInfo.description: The UK Hit Radio & recorder is complete musical app.You can play and enjoy online UK based Radio with  more than 100 an ultimate collections of radio stations.You can record high quality radio stream & save to the local sdcard, to play offline.You can set an alarm as a particular radio station or recorded audio to play particular time interval;=====  X ====================== X ===================== X ===================                                     FIXED ALL PREVIOUS  ISSUES======X======================X=======================X====================FEATURE OF APP1. Listen Ultimate collections of All UK Radio.2. You can record audio stream and play locally from sdcard.3. You can set particular radio station or recorded audio as alarm to play particular time interval like alarm   like every morning ,every evening,every half day...etc4. You can set any radio station or recorded audio as favorite to make your own play list.5. You can suggest us any idea or issues We try our best to handle and also you can share to your friends this   app with Share Option.Note: Best on Wifi,3G,4G or High speed internet. For any issue please provide your valuable suggestion. Please rate us with 5 star for motivation to create free apps.
